basic_info.title: TATA Capital Pankh Scholarship 2024-25 Apply Online, Last Date, and Amount
basic_info.author: Muhammad Saim Rasheed

program_details.description: Recognizing the crucial role education plays in shaping the future of individuals and the nation, Tata Capital, a leading financial services provider in India, has launched the Tata Capital Pankh Scholarship. This scholarship program is designed to provide financial assistance to brilliant students from economically weaker sections of society, ensuring that financial limitations do not restrict their academic aspirations. The Tata Capital Pankh Scholarship is more than just financial aid; it is a beacon of hope for countless students striving to achieve their educational goals.

academic_requirements: Students of classes 11 and 12, undergraduate degree programs, diplomas, and polytechnic courses.

additional_conditions: The student must have secured a minimum of 60% marks in the previous academic year.
The annual family income of the applicant should not exceed INR 2,50,000.
The applicant must be an Indian citizen.
The applicant must be enrolled in a recognized educational institution in India.
The scholarship is primarily intended for students who face financial hardships due to adverse circumstances or any other compelling reasons.

required_documents: Marksheets of the previous academic year
A certificate or proof of family income, issued by a competent authority
A copy of the first page of the applicantâ€™s bank passbook or a canceled cheque, showing the bank account details
A document confirming the admission or enrollment of the applicant in the current academic year
A recent passport-sized photograph of the applicant
application_process: Go to the official Tata Capital Pankh Scholarship webpage.
Register yourself by providing basic details such as name, email ID, mobile number, and creating a password.
After registering, log in to your account and fill in the detailed application form. This includes personal details, academic records, family income, and other relevant information.
Upload the necessary documents mentioned above in the specified formats. Ensure that all documents are clear and legible.
Review your application carefully to ensure all information is correct. Once satisfied, apply.
After submission, you will receive an acknowledgment receipt. Keep this for future reference.
